1 'use strict';
  2 
  3 var _ = require('underscore');
  4 
  5 module.exports = function(AV) {
  6   /**
  7    * @namespace Contains functions for calling and declaring
  8    * <a href="/docs/cloud_code_guide#functions">cloud functions</a>.
  9    * <p><strong><em>
 10    *   Some functions are only available from Cloud Code.
 11    * </em></strong></p>
 12    */
 13   AV.Cloud = AV.Cloud || {};
 14 
 15   _.extend(AV.Cloud, /** @lends AV.Cloud */ {
 16     /**
 17      * Makes a call to a cloud function.
 18      * @param {String} name The function name.
 19      * @param {Object} data The parameters to send to the cloud function.
 20      * @param {Object} options A Backbone-style options object
 21      * options.success, if set, should be a function to handle a successful
 22      * call to a cloud function.  options.error should be a function that
 23      * handles an error running the cloud function.  Both functions are
 24      * optional.  Both functions take a single argument.
 25      * @return {AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result
 26      * of the function.
 27      */
 28     run: function(name, data, options) {
 29       var request = AV._request("functions", name, null, 'POST',
 30                                    AV._encode(data, null, true));
 31 
 32       return request.then(function(resp) {
 33         return AV._decode(null, resp).result;
 34       })._thenRunCallbacks(options);
 35     },
 36 
 37     /**
 38      * Make a call to request server date time.
 39      * @param {Object} options A Backbone-style options object
 40      * options.success, if set, should be a function to handle a successful
 41      * call to a cloud function.  options.error should be a function that
 42      * handles an error running the cloud function.  Both functions are
 43      * optional.  Both functions take a single argument.
 44      * @return {AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result
 45      * of the function.
 46      * @since 0.5.9
 47      */
 48     getServerDate: function(options) {
 49       var request = AV._request("date", null, null, 'GET');
 50 
 51       return request.then(function(resp) {
 52         return AV._decode(null, resp);
 53       })._thenRunCallbacks(options);
 54     },
 55 
 56     /**
 57      * Makes a call to request a sms code for operation verification.
 58      * @param {Object} data The mobile phone number string or a JSON
 59      *    object that contains mobilePhoneNumber,template,op,ttl,name etc.
 60      * @param {Object} options A Backbone-style options object
 61      * @return {AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result
 62      * of the function.
 63      */
 64     requestSmsCode: function(data, options){
 65       if(_.isString(data)) {
 66         data = { mobilePhoneNumber: data };
 67       }
 68       if(!data.mobilePhoneNumber) {
 69         throw "Missing mobilePhoneNumber.";
 70       }
 71       var request = AV._request("requestSmsCode", null, null, 'POST',
 72                                     data);
 73       return request._thenRunCallbacks(options);
 74     },
 75 
 76     /**
 77      * Makes a call to verify sms code that sent by AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode
 78      * @param {String} code The sms code sent by AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode
 79      * @param {phone} phone The mobile phoner number(optional).
 80      * @param {Object} options A Backbone-style options object
 81      * @return {AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result
 82      * of the function.
 83      */
 84     verifySmsCode: function(code, phone, options){
 85       if(!code)
 86         throw "Missing sms code.";
 87       var params = {};
 88       if(AV._.isString(phone)) {
 89          params['mobilePhoneNumber'] = phone;
 90       } else {
 91         // To be compatible with old versions.
 92          options = phone;
 93       }
 94 
 95       var request = AV._request("verifySmsCode", code, null, 'POST',
 96                                    params);
 97       return request._thenRunCallbacks(options);
 98     }
 99   });
100 };
101
